Malikjee4 Namaskaar Ji,
Main bahut samay se aapko the piratebay.org par as a uploader ke roop main janta hoon.Aap jo kar rahe hain uske liye main aapka shukrgujar hoon aur ye kamna karta hoon ki aap movie lovers le liye hamesha aise hi sahyog dete rahein.
Meri aapse 2 darkhwast hain, savinay nivedan hai ki gour farmaiyega:-
1. Mujhe Jackie Shroff ki 'Hero' movie nahin mil rahi BRrip print main aur jo print market main available hai , uski bajae to movie ka na hona hi behtar hai.
2 Mere paas approx.  7 Tb data hai jo ki maine 6 years main gather kiya hai (totally BRrip and movies ke roop main) main usko share karna chahta hoon lekin main torrent upload karne ki barikiyan nahin janta.

isiliye meri aapse guzarish hai ki aap mujhe mygreatharyana@gmail.com par mail kare jis se ki main bhi is field main sahyog kar sakoon.
with regards.
Rohtash
